subject: Changes in standard RFP for HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects
text: Ray 75y <THRf giferabrot (7w5 4Rdev #r TTHFf  HFTT4,  HRTT TrTFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 7rnq T 0f1-5 Qa 6, #ez7-10, E1a, 7$ favrft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 49/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Standard Document/2023 Policy Circular No. 11.48/ 2023 dated 24th April, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAi/PPP/1/2022 (Comp. No. 178141)} Sub: Changes in Standard RFP for HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects- reg: MoRTH vide its letter dated 31.03.2023 has issued amendments in the standard tender documents of HAM and BOT (Toll) on following proposals: (A) Proposal for modification in the eligibility criteria for PPP Projects Credit Rating of bidders BBB and above" in the RFP of HAM and BOT (Toll) (B) Relaxation in eligibility criteria of HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects 2 approved amendments are annexed with the MoRTH letter dated 31.03.2023. A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation: 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above 24/o4/24 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3_ Web Admin for circulation: 91 { 7 91  NHAL The
